actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938, as amended.

summary.text: Permits an owner or operator of any farm in any State (except North Carolina) with an acreage allotment or quota for flue-cured tobacco under the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938 to lease all or part of such quota or allotment to any other owner or operator of a farm in another county in that State which has a current flue-curred tobacco quota or allotment. Requires approval through a referendum for such cross-county leasing by a majority of the flue-cured tobacco growers of such State.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938, as amended.
